actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to inspect and grade apples to be distributed in commerce and to prohibit the distribution in  commerce of ungraded apples.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to inspect and grade apples which are to be distributed in commerce and to adopt and use official marks to certify the grade of such apples. Prohibits the distribution in commerce of apples not so inspected and graded. Sets forth criminal penalties for violations of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to inspect and grade apples to be distributed in commerce and to prohibit the distribution in  commerce of ungraded apples.
